summary: The implementation successfully addresses both requirements. All three modal components (SubscriptionModal, ProfileSetupModal, PaymentConfirmationModal) have been updated with solid dark backgrounds (bg-slate-950/bg-slate-900) and emerald/cyan gradient styling consistent with the GlobalCapitalFlow aesthetic. No transparent backgrounds remain in the modals.

hallucinated_features.description: Added glow utility classes (glow-emerald, glow-cyan, glow-red, glow-amber) in index.css
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not specify creating custom glow shadow utilities. These CSS utilities were added but were not part of the requested modal styling updates.
